name: Silly Feathers
description:
Hello and welcome! 

You must be the one who offered to Birdysit Luna, my silly bird for a few hours. 

Thanks for that.  Since Luna's cage broke, I can't just leave her alone in the house.

So just relax a bit by playing different games and spending time with Luna.  She might be a bit spoiled,  but that's just how she grew up thanks to me.

I have to go now. Have fun!... And don't set the house on fire. I'll be back in a few hours.

*If you came across any bugs, let me know!
